name: Optimal Trader
tag_list: technical-analysis, stock-analysis, portfolio-analysis, charting, trading, daytrading, forex, currency, risk-management
overview:
Optimal Trader is a software company developing stock analysis software. The Optimal Trader software combines technical analysis with statistical analysis and neural networks. This is the basis of the Optimal Trader software. The Swedish version of the software was made available in the summer of 2006 and the international version was released in the summer of 2007.

Optimal Trader is a registered company based in Sweden.
